questions.question: Ombré or Balayage? What's the difference?
questions.answer: Ombré is a "look" and balayage is a "technique". Ombré is a gradual colour that typically goes from dark to light. Balayage means "to sweep" - we use a variety of balayage techniques that we are highly skilled at to achieve a customized look that suits you!

questions.question: Why is balayage or ombré more $ than traditional highlights?
questions.answer: Our stylists have taken extensive additional training to learn this gorgeous technique. We also block 3 hours just for YOU! In this time, we do an extensive consultation to map out a plan for your look. Each look is customized to you and your hair. Our a-la-carte pricing is a nice way for you to save some money. Don't need a blowdry? No problem! You are welcome to leave with wet hair. If your hair doesn't require a toner, we won't charge you for one! We are honest and care deeply about you and your hair.

questions.question: What is maintenance like for balayage / ombré?
questions.answer: The upside to balayage / ombré is that it can be as high or low maintenance as you wish. Some clients let theirs grow down for a year, some like to have it brought up in 6 months!

questions.question: Why do you suggest multiple sessions?
questions.answer:
We have seen WAAAY too many bad cases enter our salon where the client has been to another salon and, in one sitting, has achieved the final look they wanted BUT their hair is so damaged!
The overall health and integrity of your hair is most important to us and keeping hair on your head is our priority. If we suggest multiple sessions, it's not because we want to take your money, it's because we care about your hair!
